ValidationRule.description: Certain Loss Reasons require a sub loss reason.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND(ISPICKVAL( Loss_Reason__c , 'Competition'), ISBLANK( TEXT(Sub_Loss_Reason__c ))), AND(ISPICKVAL( Loss_Reason__c , 'No Bid'), ISBLANK( TEXT(Sub_Loss_Reason__c ))), AND(ISPICKVAL( Loss_Reason__c , 'Service Concerns'), ISBLANK( TEXT(Sub_Loss_Reason__c ))) )
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Opp_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Loss Reason you have selected requires a Sub Loss Reason. Please Select the Sub Loss Reason from the dropdown.
